website_summaries.verdict: The Blaze II is equal parts gaming powerhouse and excellent value for its price, especially considering how this beast effortlessly runs visually impressive games at their absolute best.
pros: Easily plays the latest AAA games in 1080p HD
Bright and colorful RGB LED lighting
cons: Its included mouse isn’t the best model ever

customer_reviews.title: Top quality super fast gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Blazing fast powerhouse! Very nice real gaming computer. Boots up instantly, runs anything and everything with ease. Great buy and best bang for your buck. Cable management is awesome, looks amazing, very quiet fans. It actually looks 10x better in person, picture really doesn't do it justice. Only complaint is I purchased 2 Skytech computers recently and the RAM was wrong on both orders. One was missing an 8g stick and one was 2400 instead of 3000. Customer service made good on it with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kizer so say

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered mine on July 13th when it was cheaper and also had Prime shipping and it seems they bumped the price up and no longer offer Prime on it but honestly I'm super impressed by this PC! Only things I would swap out is the motherboard and adding more RAM. Otherwise you're good to go! Ryzen 5 2600 paired with the 1660 Ti is a great gaming build. Even got two of my friends to buy Skytech PC's. They should be paying me! Edit: it's back on Prime Shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great PC at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up on the Prime Day sale for $699.00 to replace my outdated and failing PC and was floored by what a great pre-build machine this is for that price. It was well constructed, well packaged and uses solid components. I've bought computers online before and haven't always had the greatest experience but I took the risk with this one and it paid off. The tower isn't super-huge which is nice and the internals are easy to access with a tempered-glass thumb screw door. It operates extremely quietly and stays very cool. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Obviously

customer_reviews.title: No dual monitor capability!
customer_reviews.text: While the unit itself has proven to be a capable gaming rig, I'm very disappointed in it's faults. Currently I'm unable to use dual monitors as a section of ports connected to the motherboard don't work at all. I had to buy a VGA to USB adapter just to get my second monitor to work, but the graphics card does not support it, resulting in constant flickering, app crashing or apps moving between monitors. I tried redownloading drivers, reducing resolution, troubleshooting my system and BIOS, nothing worked. After spending this kind of money, I would expect the PC to have complete fully working ports at least. Wish I hadn't purchased this, useless for dual monitors/streaming purposes.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I think this has by far been my easiest experience with buying a computer! Usually, sometime within the first week of owning one, a problem is identified, I never seem to get it fully resolved. With this computer, I have only seen it over perform what I thought it would do. No problems have arisen. Any questions I have are quickly and easily answered. I am very thrilled with this computer and it's company!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Lindhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I've been really impressed with the value of this machine, kicks the but of every game I play no matter the settings so far, Witcher 3 with high settings and it's staying nice and cool. Would highly recommend if you're looking for a solid gaming system that has upgrade potential (it also looks beautiful)
customer_reviews.author: Dannyboy

customer_reviews.title: So good, so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: What a great machine for the money! Super easy to set up... and fast. I am going to replace the RAM with 32 mb, but other than that, pretty sweet right out of the box. The picture of the back of this unit in Amazon shows it has a DVI off the video card.. this is NOT THE CASE . There is no DVI on the video card. HDMI and Display Port only. And x-plane 11 runs awesome on ita
customer_reviews.author: The Monkey's Pog

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Computer arrived with no Quick Start manual. Tried to get one from Sky Tech web site, but no luck there. Had no video out to monitor. Called Sky Tech support twice, and got message, "This mailbox is full," both times. Contacted Amazon Tech Support and they called me back, but when I answered the phone, no-one was on the other end. Just several minutes of really awful music.
customer_reviews.author: HMSeamen

customer_reviews.title: Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Been waiting years looking at Pre-Builds, bit the bullet and I think we have the winner here. Clean design and good value. Not too big of a case. CONS: Somewhat limited on upgrading due to motherboard size, slight level of dust on all components. !Very Important you get drivers! This is a ASrock a320m-hdv, search and get all in one for Motherboard. Update BIOS Driver. Search TP-Link Archer T6E V1 for WiFi driver. Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 Ti drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Brettano

customer_reviews.title: Fast, great value and who doesn't love lights?
customer_reviews.text: After using a computer that most would call a door stopper because of how outdated and slow it was, this computer is a breath of fresh air and beautifully made. The led colors are mesmerizing and the speed is great. We will be using it with VR and other games so love that we can upgrade with more memory when we need it. We have no problem with the keyboard and mouse since they do what they're suppose to do and have amazing lighting effects also. Will be buying an external HD for more space, but that's so minor and takes away nothing from the the great machine this is.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Casler

customer_reviews.title: Very good performance for the $
customer_reviews.text: My experience with my Blaze II hasn't been absolutely perfect but I feel my unit is a blip on the radar so to speak. Bluetooth in my unit is non existent for some reason (had to buy a Bluetooth dongle separately). also I think there is a small issue with my ports (sometimes the picture on my screen will just go black and come back after a couple of seconds). neither of which have made me regret my purchase. for the money this tower has performed brilliantly with everything I've thrown at it, without a sweat. would definitely recommend. Also, their customer support is absolutely stellar.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan DeFranco

customer_reviews.title: Runs games great! But...
customer_reviews.text: I love this desktop, it runs great with games on steam and league of legends. The performance on this PC is an A+. I love the look of the tower and how the leds change colors. But the only down side is that only one of the hdmi port does work. Well technically, any of the ports for the monitor on the top doesn’t even work. It’s unfortunate because you’re basically forced to purchase a dvi or dp cable. Unless you have one on hand already. Other than that it’s great I like it for the most part!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for FFXIV, and price is hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: I already have a mac, but I wanted to play FFXIV with max graphics and good framerate (60+). Well, this system does that with no problem. I got it during the Amazon prime days savings, so the price was unbeatable. I can't say much about the performance of any other game, because I don't really play anything else. FFXIV runs 60+ fps at max graphics with no slowdown or lag. It drives my 4K monitor without any issues. I'm actually surprised at how much better it looks than the macbook. No issues with the system so far. I'll update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: James Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago, so far it is amazing. Works perfectly well for gaming which is what I bought it for. Once I have had it for a little while longer I will edit this review. However as things stand I'm giving it a 5 star review, it has preformed beyond what my old junk desktop could handle. Tech support is amazing! The keyboard that came with this had a small issue and they were very quick to replace the keyboard, i'm waiting for it to ship, but Skytech Gaming does care about it's customers.
customer_reviews.author: Mikael

customer_reviews.title: WORST EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: I SPENT THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS FOR A NEW.SETUP DONT PUT RAM IN THIS TRASH THING(UGHH I WISH I COULD CUSS) BECAUSE IT WILL BREAK AND YOU WON'T GET ANY HELP I SPENT ALL DAY ON THIS TRASH F SKYTECH DONT TRUST THEM BUILD YOUR OWN PC I HAD A PHOTO OF ME FLICKING IT OFF BUT AMAZON WON'T LET ME POST IT STUPID FAMILY FRIENDLY SITE F THIS THING
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: Great For Gaming, Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: This Gaming PC was easy to set up out of the box, runs games fast without glitches, (be aware you have to have a proper internet speed for this), and looks great! Haven't had the need to use tech support at all. Came with a heavy duty keyboard (metal bottom instead of plastic) as well. Very satisfied. We did have to do a wired in connect with the internet as the WiFi was somehow confusing the loading time, but once we did that it was perfect! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L.

customer_reviews.title: Required Specs - Yay
customer_reviews.text: My son pre-ordered a new video game and was recently allowed to download it. The download appeared to be fine, but when he went to play, the game would not load. It turned out that our previous computer was not able to handle the minimum required specification for the game. We needed a new computer asap. When we looked online, we found this computer and it had the recommended specifications, not just the minimum, for the game. Once we received the computer, my son installed that game and the day was saved. The computer also has really cool LED lights that can change color or be static. It makes the computer look as cool as it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Fast and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Hi there. I can recommend this gaming PC. It's doing his job fast and cool. I gonna put 4 stars only because I had problem with motherboard and did replacement but now I get a new one, and everything is OK. Prepare to check it in games.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't arrive quickly , Can be difficult to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful computer , DOESN'T ARRIVE QUICKLY HOW EVER! And at first setting it up was a process , But all in all , LOVE THE COMPUTER! Work's great for gaming , Has a few minor glitches but nothing too bad . Check the fan's and such when you put it together and plugged in , Id recommend it to who ever enjoys a decent priced gaming computer.
customer_reviews.author: KrystalA29

customer_reviews.title: met the need
customer_reviews.text: My kids had started to take over my PC so i needed something quick, i have built prior PCs usually based on the need to run windows, office and other mundane applications not the ability to run games. We received the unit and right out started it and they were beating the keys and mouse within an hour. We are not power gamers, it works well with xbox stuff, it tolerates a 3 year old beating the keys sending confusing messages, is quite. I did upgrade the wireless to include bluetooth for some existing headsets we had
customer_reviews.author: gregg w martin

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: Overall great gaming PC. People say it’s a good “starter” Pc but it’s actually good for even the advanced gamers. I can run Tarkov 100% on this Pc. I would 100% suggested adding more RAM since it only comes with 8 and you’ll need to add more storage but otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Love this PC for gaming
customer_reviews.text: This is the first real gaming PC I've had and I love it. I have had zero issues with it and am able to run all my games on it. I usually play in PS4 other than a couple of games but I actually ended up getting some of my favorite games to play on the computer. They run extremely well and look beautiful and mods have been a great addition to the experience. Everything runs well, even with the mods! I have not had any experience with their customer support so I can't attest to that.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mid range pc. So far it has performed very well on the games that I have tested. It can handle sea of thieves on max graphic settings at 1440p 70 fps and around 120fps at 1080p. On the back of the pc there is a switch to turn on "silent mode" that makes the pc run very quietly, making a huge difference in sound. The set up process was very simple and straightforward. With that being said the experience has been great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Coltan Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As my very first gaming PC, I did not expect the craftsmanship to be this clean and sharp looking. Very fast, very attractive machine that performs like a dream. So far I’ve been able to max out gaming settings on every game, no issues there. My only gripe is the PDF on how to manage the machine itself, more specifically how to add another storage device. The PDF does not tell you how to do it and I find that important for new PC owners who are scared to mess anything up. Other than that, VERY satisfied with my purchase, I definitely got what I paid for and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Drouin

customer_reviews.title: This PC is a real nice option for a decent priced pre built
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a good intro gaming pc that won't totally breaks the budget and still be able to run games at a nice 60 fps. runs very well, looks good (I did have to fix a loose rgb cable inside but easy fix) and overall very quiet and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miller

customer_reviews.title: This really is great
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this PC for a few days, so my review is based on my initial impression, but so far this machine is fantastic. The only downside to this machine is with the case. The HDMI and DisplayPort are very close to the edge of a certain part of the case making it near impossible to get a regular HDMI or DisplayPort cable into the port. I ordered an ultra-thin HDMI to see if that'll remedy the problem, but the mere fact I have to do this knocks this PC down a few points. But other than that, this machine is great and will run just about any game on max settings at a good FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Addai

customer_reviews.title: Best PC for the money
customer_reviews.text: You won't find a better deal if you're looking for a PC that will play any modern game on high-max settings with good FPS. Even building a PC yourself, unless you were very patient and found some great sales on multiple parts, you likely couldn't beat this value. I only had one very small issue with the PC when I first received it, contacted Skytech via tech support chat on their website and immediately got a reply that fixed my problem right away. PC is very well built and surprisingly the RAM wasn't cheap stuff or anything like that. Highly recommend if you're looking for great performance that won't hurt your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Willis

customer_reviews.title: My 14 years old's review of this item
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy that i get good frames when playing videogames even while streaming, 1 thing i don't enjoy is sometimes i have to restart my pc to get into apps
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hammerstein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Value!
customer_reviews.text: This product is an amazing starter PC at an amazing price! This will run most Triple A Games smoothly even when recording and streaming with amazing visual quality. This machine is built strong too, it survived our 1200 mile move in the trunk of our car with barely any padding. Very quite and such a high quality product! I highly recommend this product and any others from this company. Purchase also included a keyboard and mouse that was not clearly stated to come with the machine. Both included products work extremely well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Haines-Storm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer
customer_reviews.text: Never bought a pre-built desktop before, but this was an excellent one to begin with. Works exactly as expected though the fans can be quite noisy, esp under heavy load while gaming, but it's not too bad. My only complaint is the keyboard that's included. Looks nice, but as you can see from the odd spacing in my typing here... some of the keys don't work all that well. But that's just a minor quibble. I recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Solid Skytech Modern Gaming PC Review
customer_reviews.text: Had this pc for about 6 months now, has been super reliable and met all expectations for the specs so far. Have added another 8gb ram cartridge which was super easy, couldn’t find harness to mount hard drive tho, so I used velcro to put a 2tb external on the back side without any hassle. Also great PC tower to build off of and upgrade, reason it’s 4stars was because price at the time of purchase. But seeing the price drop now, it’s even more worth it, pricing is very fair considering specs and compared to other prebuilts on the market! Great product skytech!
customer_reviews.author: nick mae

customer_reviews.title: Not New
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer new, but when I tried plugging it in there was no signal display for the monitor. I tried everything I could do that youtube told me to try and nothing worked. I then took it to geek squad, and top city tech and both parties said it was unfixable. The graphics card was dead on arrival and the motherboard was used, not new. When I pay 900$ for something that is said to be new I expect there to be zero used parts and for it to be in working condition. First purchase of a gaming pc and I get screwed by amazon and skytech.
customer_reviews.author: kloie mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Not Working
customer_reviews.text: I am quite tech savvy, and ordered this pc along with a monitor. I AM quite Disappointed in the turn out customer support has been of no help and this computer all I did was take it out of the box put the power source in and turned it on it is turning on and is connected to the monitor but the monitor displays the message check your source and connection. If the maker of this product would like to help and can help me fix the problem I will change this to a 4 star review
customer_reviews.author: anne griffin

customer_reviews.title: Build your own look at YT
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 4 days perfectly fine got everything set up then abruptly after i turned it off a few hours prior it turns on but doesn't have any display through any displayport to my brand new lg monitor or through hdmi, monitor or 4k tv, and while restarting the pc it refused to accept the normal shutdown sequence through the power button so i had to hold it in to force shutdown every time i wanted to restart. Returning in process and plan on building my own. FYI from what i could tell just looking at this PC, mainly the case, it is not upgrade-friendly
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not have DVD drive!
customer_reviews.text: Note that this computer, aparently as many other newer models, does not have an internal DVD drive. Tech support, though open only during business hours, has been helpful and responsive to questions. I have no technical problems with the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Fast and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Blazing fast, high quality. For anyone who wants to know, you can have 4 monitors connected at once. You can play Fortnite at 120 fps (Really any game). And it looks spectacular. :D Tech support responds to every email fast. Only issues is the call, there never seems to be a receiver. Just keep trying at random times and you'll get one!
customer_reviews.author: Karrie L

customer_reviews.title: Functional and tackles all gaming uses
customer_reviews.text: I use the PC to game in 4k in non-demanding titles like Fortnite and Destiny 2. I'm happy to say at competivtive settings I average over 110 FPS (4k) in both games and I am quite impressed by this. The fans are not too loud on silent mode, the power usage isn't insane, the performance is just as expected, easy to setup, etc. In terms of value for money, of course any pre-built will cost more than it costs to build yourself. Accounting for all the parts there is around a $30 differential. However a keyboard and mouse are included with the pc which closes the margin and makes it a 'bang for your buck'
customer_reviews.author: ANAND

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Easy plug and play gaming pc. Gets the job done on all games on @ 1080p. Popular games like fortnite and apex run at a steady 144 fps for me. Upgradeable, which is great for me considering I plan on doing that. Case is clean a good looking RGB is pretty standard. No problems so far so cant say much about tech support. Fans are kind of loud, that’s probably my biggest gripe so far. Otherwise than that, probably One of the best <1000$ pc out there.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This item advertised as having an ASUS A320M motherboard. Actual motherboard some random green, unbranded nonsense, missing some features (nvme/pcie slot in particular). Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Harm Markdorff

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a little over a month ago. I got the blue screen of death on Friday Nov 8. I should have known better. Buying a Dell from Costco, don't have time to fool around with stuff like this. Jay Weaver
customer_reviews.author: orangeboss101

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: I love the SDD. It starts fast and loads fast. I haven't gamed on it yet, but the video seems great. I have an older monitor--I need to upgrade to an HD monitor--but, wife says not yet. I think you'll be very happy with his computer for this price. It's been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Otterby

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival. Wouldn't Power On. Shoddy quality
customer_reviews.text: Would not even power on. Case was flimsy, wiring job of the components looked like a birds nest with a big ball of cables just stuffed under the drive bay cover. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Stover

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE - DESTROYS ANY 1080P GAME while MULTITASKING
customer_reviews.text: This is a great PC for those who want to run 99% of 1080P games on max settings or if you're just dipping your toes in the world of "battlestations". The graphics card itself is worth ~$300. Throw in all the other parts + installation... GREAT VALUE. I was worried about the RGB fans looking tacky, but I was wrong. They look clean. THERE IS ONLY 1 ACTIVE HDMI PORT, make sure you have display-port cables/adapters if using multiple monitors. The only downside, and this is really picky, is that the side glass is on the left and it is not possible to switch it to the right(without a ridiculous amount of work) if you get a new desk setup.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend took a dump on me after 10 hours and SkyTech support doesn’t even answer to help you
customer_reviews.text: Worked just fine when I first got it then after I took a break and try to go back on it. It was stuck on the asrocks reboot screen and kept failing and going in a loop.Tried to call them for technical support but waited on the line twice for over thirty minutes just to leave a voicemail. Decided to send it back and let them deal with that piece of junk and didn’t even have the mouse and keyboard that was supposed to come with it. Do not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've had the computer for a couple months now without any issues. I'm running most games at 1440p 144 hz with atleast 60 frames. When I check what the computer is actually running and the parts advertised matched all but the ram,which I was planning on swapping out and selling anyway.
customer_reviews.author: David Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Runs Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this computer. It was very affordable and runs perfectly. I have had no issues with any parts of it this far. I can play basically any video game at 60 FPS or more while recording it. I have been playing ark on it and it runs so smoothly and looks amazing. I'm so glad I found this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: New too New to know!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, son struggled with getting x box games to transfer. Nice and quiet. Cool lights shine through the tempered glass. However it is too early into owning it to give a truly fair assessment of the computers capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: vinny

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i can say is i really impressed by this PC with a great price and can execute great game performance. Although there is a small disadvantage on this PC is it only have 8 GB 3000 Hz RAM, it still great overall. I still highly recommend for buy this PC.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you're looking to get into Iracing and Esports.👍
customer_reviews.text: Had computer a little over a month love it so fare. Easy set up and I'm no IT guy. Always was a fan of the console's. I have a Microsoft surface also this is my first gaming computer and definitely kicks but. Would recommend to anyone looking to get into PC gaming. Thank you Amazon and Skytech nice build!👍
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Good product that works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was a little put off by the other reviews about a dead-on-arrival computer. Fortunately, the instructions were clear on how to set up the computer and get it started. I had no problems getting power and display to work, and it works great for the gaming that I do. The light displays are cool, and the included keyboard and mouse are a nice bonus
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kenan

customer_reviews.title: Dead out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I received this earlier this week and just had the chance to hook the pc up. No visible damage to packaging or unit. Turned it on and it lit up with fans spinning, but NO SIGNAL to monitor. Check connections on cables as well as reseated video card. Nothing. I am waiting on response from Skytech Tech department. 12/23/2019 Update Finally spoke with the tech at Skytech and got the PC running (memory card was installed in the wrong slot). Works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: D K Wason

customer_reviews.title: Great pc for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very good gaming pc for it’s price. It runs very smooth and fast, only caveats would it only coming with 8 gb ram, but more can be easily installed. Also you most likely need another hard drive since the 500 it comes with won’t get you that far.
customer_reviews.author: Dana haynie

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup
customer_reviews.text: As someone without a lot of time on my hands or a ton of experience setting up desktops, this was great. It came with very few setup steps, and was easy to get online in minutes. I bought this PC for VR, and so far it's performing like a champ. Getting really good results. Worth noting that the startup time of the machine is really quick. The lack of bloatware probably plays a huge factor here.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kraus

customer_reviews.title: After a difficult beginning, happy with the end result
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PC from my brother's amazon account. So when I first received the PC it wouldn't turn on. I did not receive a manual book and surprise tech support doesn't answer. After my brother looking at it and making sure everything was plugged in correctly on the inside and finding out that it only works with HDMI Cable on the monitor. After a hard beginning, it is a great gaming PC. Everything works great now. You definitely get what you pay for but overall I'm happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rad

customer_reviews.title: Great overall pc from an expert
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, especially for pricing, i was about to buy a mac mini, but this is so crisp and nice, the added dual band wifi adapter made the wifi reach up to my room. Great specs, it has nearly 500 gbs of storage, 8 ram-upgradable, and a 1660 ti!, even if i tried doing the build, it might be the same price, 1 great purchase with easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: archi2201

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Great For Streaming!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was overall one of the best decisions I've made in my life. I cant get enough of playing games with this thing its truly amazing! I started my first stream and it runs great without a doubt! I defiantly recommend this computer to any other sellers. You will get your moneys worth for sure! I switched from playing on a Nintendo Switch hooked up to a monitor and i have no desire to ever go back to controller/Nintendo Switch. Overall, affordable, great specs, amazing for streaming, and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Michelone

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter
customer_reviews.text: I researched quite a bit before purchasing my 12 year old son's first gaming computer. This tower has everything he needs and more. The set up was easy and he was ready to play the same day. Many components are upgrade-able. We hooked it up to his television with a HDMI cord with no problem. This should last him quite a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Hardware on the computer I recurved didn’t match description at all. Motherboard didn’t have RGB ports so fans worked but did not light up, and the processor was a ryzen 1200 2 core processor. Would not recommend any buy this as chances are the product you receive will not be as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No display port
customer_reviews.text: It runs games great but there is no display port so you either have to spend more on a display or you will not get over a 60 Hz refresh rate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, everything went smoothly from the shipping to the unboxing. Ran into some minor trouble with getting a no input from my HDMI cable, from what I suspected the insulation must of unlocked the ram a bit and moved it out of place. After I finished trouble shooting, got my system up and running and updated my graphics driver and installed my own ram and toy into the case lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box speed!
customer_reviews.text: Once this computer was plugged in it was ready to go! Playing my favorite games on the highest settings with the highest frames was worth the purchase. The only dislike is the lack of cable management (all cables are sort of shoved into a hidden space), and adding a second hard drive requires a special dock for the case to attach the drive to the chassis. Other than that it’s an awesome setup!
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: This computer is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my son. He loves it! We did a lot of research before purchasing this. It really is a great deal. He loves playing Rainbow 6 Siege and CSGO. The computer performs very well. I would definitely recommend it for anyone who is a gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Mark W

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be scared I was too
customer_reviews.text: My honest opinion is it’s great for game its colorful and very easy to set up I only had one problem my screen went dark 3 times and and turn on switch in the back to get that fans working better and never had a problem I feel like that was a dumb moment for me but I am a first time pc owner and I love it trust me I was on the fence too I traded the reviews but it’s came out just as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Domenic Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I've only had it for a week now, but i like it so far. I use it for light gaming (Sims 4, Stardew valley, a little bit of grand theft auto) and they all run really well. the RGB lights are nice you can change the colors with the button on the top. as for the noise its not that loud to me but its not exactly quiet either. worked right out the box and its looking good . 💖❤💖
customer_reviews.author: jasmin joseph

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS GAMING PC!
customer_reviews.text: This PC is amazing! It was really easy to set up and runs games perfectly. I’ve played Apex Legends, GTA 5,CS GO,Fortnite. Everything runs above 75FPS and looks clean. I 100% recommended this to everyone . (SKYTECH BLAZE II)
customer_reviews.author: BM_Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pc
customer_reviews.text: Wow...this pc is amazing. It came very well packaged and I love the design of the case. It runs very cool even when gaming for countless hours and will run around 220fps playing fortnite. My son is in love with his new pc.
customer_reviews.author: JZee

customer_reviews.title: power supply
customer_reviews.text: This is a pic of garbage the power supply is not working after 4 mouths of use skytech I will let my facebook friends know about this pc do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for naught.
customer_reviews.text: I was eagerly awaiting the new computer for the kids online work. Gaming for Dad after school work is done. Instead there was a shipping mishap and I received a broken sauder build end table. Quite an anticlimactic moment. Amazon was amazing handling the return. Just have to wait for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Crashed playing Fortnite
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer for my 16 year old son who was switching from ps4 to computer to play mostly Fortnite. The computer continually crashed when he tried to play.
customer_reviews.author: Stacykubiak

customer_reviews.title: Came in exactly as described, very quickly. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of sketched out at first because of some of the reviews, but it is an awesome product! i would recommend getting another keyboard and mouse, if you don't have one, they will work, but they're not great. Other than that, i just bought another harddrive and some different ram and i love it!
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Works great with VR headsets!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the clean build (from someone who used to build his own PC's), arrived in great condition, worked perfectly, just needed to update a few drivers (mostly for VR). Using it with my Oculus Rift S, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Joy N Bishop

customer_reviews.title: It's OK doesn't perform well
customer_reviews.text: The pc is very quite that a good thing how ever pc doesnt perform well had trouble starting it an running 1 game on med quality cpu is running at 89% if you want a streaming pc go somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Hooked up to a 4k TV and no issues. Ram is a single 8GB, so when you expand you will either need another 8gb or (2) 16gb.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Melton

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming PC!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described! Easy to assemble, quiet, light weight, and very powerful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: UserUnknown666399

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for xmas for him to game on and do homework, so far have had not issues with it since setting up and it seems to work well. Paired it up with a 21" 1080p monitor and the graphics card dose well for what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good computer.
customer_reviews.text: Would've been nice if they included the power cable so I could actually use it but fortunately, I found one from a spare PC I had laying around. I rate this purchase 10/Ten IGN. Like buying new glasses after how many years and going, "Wait, there was this much detail!?"
customer_reviews.author: Aikatsuyuri

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smooth, struggles with Overwatch but other than that runs like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter PC, unfortunately not what im looking for. Very nice and quiet as well. The support team was nice and called back when they missed me. I just need a stronger PC for my games as well as streaming them. For the price, i believe its worth it you just need a few upgrades but this is a great PC to start off with.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Nunez

customer_reviews.title: solid computer for price but no tech support
customer_reviews.text: solid computer with good components at a decent price. However, right out of the box the wifi card and antenna did not work and when I contacted tech support for help they did not respond. As of this review several days later still have not gotten a response. otherwise the pc is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Monsees

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great system. Had some challenges with the multiple headshone/speaker connections and needed an adapter for my 3.5 to USB. Besides that, it's exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this pc. Very easy setup and love the cable management aswell. It had a Quality Control Certificate that came with it to show my pc was handled with care I love it;). I have yet to find a flaw in this pc or with Skytech Gaming who built it. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to buy a new rig
customer_reviews.author: andrew stanley

customer_reviews.title: Came dead on arrival and wouldn't boot up just blue screen of death.
customer_reviews.text: There was no outer cardboard for protection, just the normal box and was packed well inside that. Nothing appeared to be broken. I tried to contact the support but no one answered after 5 times and the voicemail was full. Sent it back and went with HP. Was more expensive but was a brand known.
customer_reviews.author: william f perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Hard to beat. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the computer. Looks great plays well. This is a fantastic value for your dollar. Plays whatever i throw at with high settings on nearly all my games. I do feel bummed at the fact that AMD has recently released there 3rd generation processor and the mother board here is not compatable with the new line of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Truax

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Day 1: So far so good. Love this PC. Arrived early, Packaging was great. Set up and install was very quick and easy. Beautiful pre-build. USB-c would have been nice but does have USB-3.0. Will report back in 15-30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Eskay

customer_reviews.title: Good starting pc
customer_reviews.text: I love the performance out of the box but the price is steeper than if you built your own which is to be expected. That being said, I have had zero issues with this desk top. All I have done is add a 32 GB ddr4 ram chip set to the system and I get a nice consistent 50-60fps. Any questions just ask.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good pc for the price. I’d recommend it. Does everything I need it to do perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Verified

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is amazing. It does everything they said it would and more
customer_reviews.author: Melody R McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very nice packaging and instructions. I didn't expect a mouse and keyboard with it, what a wonderful surprise. Very happy with your services. I yet have to plug in this computer too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The computer is working just as expected and is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: The Moody Family.

customer_reviews.title: Computer arrived with RAM dim fallen out of motherboard
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find it at first, will update once I fire it up.
customer_reviews.author: Abrlcklnthewall

customer_reviews.title: Oh baby.
customer_reviews.text: So awesome, I wish I was writing this from my phone so I could share the picture I took but this PC is beautiful you just plug in the power, plug in your HDMI and get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wolverton

customer_reviews.title: great system
customer_reviews.text: I is exactly as advertised. looks good, runs great, and keyboard and mouse are high end. Only con is the antennas for the WIFI card did not come with it. I don't use WIFI so not a huge issue for me, but should have been there. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Briggs

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY / CUSTOMER SERVICE IS TERRIBLE TOO
customer_reviews.text: Pictured here is my new HP omen PC. Actually worked out of the box. Skytech is crap. Customer service BEYOND TERRIBLE (called me next day, after i returned it).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price great experience
customer_reviews.text: This product came in handy after my PC expired and I was happy to know it runs better, and is more convenient ,than my last gen computer. I'd recommend it to anyone who's looking for a quality piece of gaming technology.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: The 2 week wait for the computer was well worth it. Runs games at a higher FPS than the company indicated and is super fast. Definitely one of the better brands for pre built PCs out there. 11/10 rating!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Simons

customer_reviews.title: gaming speed
customer_reviews.text: all I have to say its theee best^ especially for gaming and plus its at the right price too! Well, recommend getting this for your first gaming pc because it's my first!
customer_reviews.author: Deavon

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: When I received my package today the side panel was shattered into pieces I will be trying to get a replacement today and will update my review dependin on how this goes
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaming, Streaming
customer_reviews.text: I use this for gaming and so far have had no problems. I run Black Ops 3 above 90fps and pretty much any other game from that time. It includes wireless wifi, just screw on some antenna and it's fine. Ships fast, arrived safe, and even comes with a keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: icy riots

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gaming computer for Fortnite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gaming pc for my son for his birthday. He solely uses it for Fortnite and loves its speed and frames per second. He said it was very fast and much better than his XBOX.
customer_reviews.author: Troy4321

customer_reviews.title: Bonkers pc
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gaming pc, I switched from Xbox and I wanted something that could run any game with ease. Only thing I would recommend is upgrading the ram but honestly you don’t have too. Great pc!!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sky tech computer
customer_reviews.text: Very bad i will not buy one ever again technical support is very bad its to bad because it a nice looking computer.
customer_reviews.author: paul farland

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 TI 6GB GDDR6 Video Card | 8 GB Gaming Memory DDR4 3000 with Heat Spreader | Windows 10 Home 64-bit
